overview:
“Joe Salesky leads ClairMail as President and CEO, drawing upon his 25 years of management experience in providing business solutions to the Fortune 100. Most recently, Joe served as the CTO of AppStream, and previously as the CEO and founder of PictureTalk, Inc. (presently Pixion) and Skytron Corporation. Additionally, he held key executive positions at nCUBE and Oracle.

Joe contributed to the development and received patents on technologies now part of enterprise infrastructure, including the original patent for web-conferencing. Joe holds a bachelor’s degree in economics with an emphasis in corporate finance and computer science at the University of California at Davis.” (Source: ClairMail)
